      • exportToJPG

        public static void exportToJPG(java.io.OutputStream os,
                               com.googlecode.whatswrong.NLPCanvasRenderer renderer,
                               com.googlecode.whatswrong.NLPInstance instance,
                               double scaleFactor)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Export to JPG. For some reason the background comes out pink, I have no idea why. Note that this method /does not/ close the outputstream after writing, this is up to the caller.
        Parameters:
        os - The stream to write to
        renderer - The renderer to use
        instance - The instance to render
        scaleFactor - The scaling factor. Set to 1 for default size.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • exportToPNG

        public static void exportToPNG(java.io.OutputStream os,
                               com.googlecode.whatswrong.NLPCanvasRenderer renderer,
                               com.googlecode.whatswrong.NLPInstance instance,
                               double scaleFactor)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Export to PNG. Note that this method /does not/ close the outputstream after writing, this is up to the caller.
        Parameters:
        os - The stream to write to
        renderer - The renderer to use
        instance - The instance to render
        scaleFactor - The scaling factor. Set to 1 for default size.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
